content: have fun with this harvest moon inspired little cow pattern it is a beginner friendly pattern that works up quite quickly the single pieces are crocheted seperately and then sewn together it can be worked in any kind of yarn using a hook in the corresponding size this pattern uses us terms would love to get your feedback about the pattern and look forward to seeing your little cows please tag me in your instagram posts or link back to the pattern directly if you happen to make one happy hooking for the russian version of the pattern scroll all the way down on the blog post for the picture slideshow
